M

main(String[]) - Static method in class MPC.mpc
This is the "main" method of the Mini-Pascal Compiler.
makeFilename(String, String) - Static method in class MPC.mpc
Constructs a filename given an original name and a new extension.
makeMPCStream(String, String, String) - Static method in class MPC.mpc
Tries to open the file that makeFilename builds; prints error message and returns null if it fails.
markError() - Method in class MPC.MPCScanner
Marks a scanning error, with no extra message;
markError(String) - Method in class MPC.MPCScanner
Marks a scanning error, with an extra message;
markError(int, String) - Method in class MPC.MPCScanner
Marks a scanning error in the current input line, given a column position and an extra message.
METHODS - Static variable in class MPC.sym
 
MINUS - Static variable in class MPC.sym
 
MOD - Static variable in class MPC.sym
 
move(MPCScanner.CharClass) - Method in enum MPC.MPCScanner.State
Looks up the Transition from this State, given an input character class.
MPC - package MPC
 
mpc - Class in MPC
mpc stands for Mini-Pascal Ccompiler.
mpc() - Constructor for class MPC.mpc
 
MPCContext - Class in MPC
This class maintains flags and similar context for the Mini-Pascal compiler
MPCContext(MPCStream, MPCStream) - Constructor for class MPC.MPCContext
The obvious constructor that initializes the two output streams
MPCContext.Flag - Enum in MPC
Enumeration for the command flags
MPCScanner - Class in MPC
Scans an input character stream into Pascal tokens.
MPCScanner(InputStream, PrintStream, PrintStream) - Constructor for class MPC.MPCScanner
Builds a new scanner object given input, token output, and error output streams.
MPCScanner.Accept - Enum in MPC
codes for accepting states, one for each kind of token initially scanned (an ID may turn out to be a keyword)
MPCScanner.Action - Enum in MPC
codes for actions that can happen at transitions
MPCScanner.CharClass - Enum in MPC
Character classes, i.e., equivalence classes of input letters
MPCScanner.ClassRange - Class in MPC
Really just a record/struct, indicating that a range of character values (from lo through hi, inclusive) belong to the indicated character class (and are treated equivalently for purposes of scanning).
MPCScanner.State - Enum in MPC
the scanner is written as a finite state machine; this nested (but not "inner") class defines the information we associate with each state
MPCScanner.Transition - Class in MPC
Represents a transition to a new State, with a sequence of Actions to take
MPCStream - Class in MPC
Adds indentation support to a PrintStream; helpful for nicely formatted AST output, etc.
MPCStream(OutputStream) - Constructor for class MPC.MPCStream
builds an MPCStream given an underlying OutputStream
MPCStream(OutputStream, String) - Constructor for class MPC.MPCStream
builds an MPCStream given an underlying OutputStream
MPCStream(String) - Constructor for class MPC.MPCStream
as a convenience, will build an MPCStream given a filename
